website_summaries.verdict: The best choice if you want superb craftsmanship and early 1900s style. But the high price and unique style aren't for everyone.
pros: Made with artistic manufacturing techniques for an old-fashioned look
Traditional dome style and elegant beadwork fringe
cons: The priciest model on our shortlist
The extravagant, feminine style isn't as versatile as some other models

customer_reviews.title: Love the shades
customer_reviews.text: Love the shades, just gorgeous! I purchased 2 first one was missing strand of beads here and there, 2nd shade missing lots of strands of beads some missing 2 strands right next to one another which made a gap in 4 different places. Mess to unpack I had styrofoam everywhere the bags had opened up and made a big mess. They are large and beautiful! Would buy again!
customer_reviews.author: Pam

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful!
customer_reviews.text: Beautiful shade! I bought a cheap bed room lamp from Hobby Lobby, and put this shade on it. It is gorgeous. It's very Downton Abbey. =) Just need to watch my cats, they love batting the beads.
customer_reviews.author: Linda

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: All I can say is BEAUTIFUL. Exactly what I was looking for and arrived sooner than expected.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: and it's just beautiful.
customer_reviews.text: What can l say? This is a quality shade, and it's just beautiful.
customer_reviews.author: Jimifan67

customer_reviews.title: nice shade!
customer_reviews.text: This is exactly as pictured, except the fringe is more like 3 inches verses the 6-7" it appears to be. Still, very satisfied with this shade and it spices up any lamp base. Very nice!
customer_reviews.author: Marc R.

customer_reviews.title: Fabric and Fringe Dome Replacement Shade (Medya Lighting)
customer_reviews.text: I put my new shade on my lamp and loved it. The color, fabric and dome beaded fringe style is perfect for my lamp. The lighting through the shade is perfect. Really rich looking! I have received so many complements on this replacement shade. Highly recommended by me.
customer_reviews.author: E. Dot

customer_reviews.title: Love it. Bought for a bedroom but it was ...
customer_reviews.text: Love it. Bought for a bedroom but it was perfect for the living room. Beautiful shade.
customer_reviews.author: Fran

customer_reviews.title: Love it!
customer_reviews.text: Wow is all i can say. A little pricey, but you get what you pay for. High quality craftsmanship and stunning center piece of any room. Love it!
customer_reviews.author: Danb

customer_reviews.title: Fabric and Fringe Dome Replacement shade.
customer_reviews.text: This lampshade is so well made & very classy & with glass beads. I absolutely love it!! So if you are looking to class up your room, this shade will do it.
customer_reviews.author: Dee

customer_reviews.title: Absolutely beautiful!
customer_reviews.text: These shades are very well made, very sturdy. I've gotten lots of compliments on them already, so glad I found them!
customer_reviews.author: MissRhondaLee

customer_reviews.title: Beads fell off during shipment.
customer_reviews.text: Poorly crafted beads fell off tassels during shipment. Poor quality for the price.
customer_reviews.author: scott s

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: I love it!!--get complements on it all the time--it's exquisite!!
customer_reviews.author: carol perry

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful
customer_reviews.text: This shade is large and fits well on my standing lamp base. The cream color allows plenty of light through and the long beaded fringe is very elegant.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful- the picture does not do it justice.
customer_reviews.text: Beautiful- the picture does not do it justice. I bought if for a bedroom lamp but I had to put in my living room as it was that beautuful
customer_reviews.author: tammy

customer_reviews.title: Lampshade
customer_reviews.text: Beautiful lampshade! Fast shipper. Very well protected for shipping. Isabelles Lighting is a fantastic seller. I highly recommend. THANKS!
customer_reviews.author: Obsessed Shopper

product_meta.title: Meyda Tiffany 17361 Fabric & Fringe Dome Shade, 18" Width, Ivory
product_meta.description: Nearly two decades ago, Meyda Tiffany acquired quality bent glass Company which created original lighting fixtures, including the famous Coca-Cola chandeliers, and supplied them to tiffany studios in new York city in the early 1900S. We utilize QBG's original tools, molds and techniques to create nostalgic lighting products today. In the mid-1990s, meyda purchased mecco art, a metal art studio, and utilizes its equipment and manufacturing techniques to produce spectacular custom crafted lighting and decor under the meyda custom lighting brand. Under the meyda lighting brand, thousands of decorative styles are offered through fine dealers in the and many designs are inspired by the Works of Louis comfort tiffany, dirk van erp, gustav stickley, and other masters, as well as the Arts and Crafts, rustic, gothic, revival and contemporary themes. Our extensive line includes table and floor lamps, ceiling pendants, chandeliers, outdoor lighting, wall sconces, stained glass windows, fireplace screens, billiard/kitchen island fixtures, novelty items, and more.
feature_bullets: Brought to you by Meyda Tiffany

specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.5 out of 5 stars20 ratings4.5 out of 5 stars
